pageProps.title: Ali: Fear Eats the Soul movie review (1974) | Roger Ebert

children.value: “Ali: Fear Eats the Soul” might sound like improbable, contrived soap opera. It doesn’t play that way. The reason it gathers so much power, I think, is that Fassbinder knew exactly what was meant by the title, and made the film so quickly he only had time to tell the truth.
